mainText:
To Steve:

Restart and reboot yourself Steve,
you are free to go.
Password: Apple
enter here,
right now.
Force quit: directly to iCloud. Move to trash: never.
Rise up as a Leopard, Tiger or Lion.
You will never die.
You are free to go.

Mixing some lyrics of the Unknown caller U2 song.
Typing from my great Macbook Pro.
author: Alejandra
